articles.title: Beware! Solar flare and geomagnetic storm set to burst the Earth - DNA India
articles.description: An unstable patch on the surface of the Sun is directly facing our planet so chances are if it bursts it might cause solar flares and geomagnetic storms. Dark regions which form on the Sun due to magnetism are known as Sunspots.
